Service Details: - Raises awareness and funds in the fight against prostate cancer- Formerly called the Do It For Dad Walk/Run, this annual event is held in several communities across BC, offers an opportunity to honour prostate cancer survivors, promote awareness of the number one cancer in men, and raise money to help find a cure- Volunteer opportunities available
